wikitext.*:
The '''Fens of Sirion''' were the fens and marshes that formed around the lakes of [[Aelin-uial]] on the River [[Sirion]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>  [[Beren]] passed through the Fens when he departed from [[Doriath]] on the beginning of his quest to win a [[Silmaril]].<ref>{{S|Beren}}</ref>
